job_tasks.phrase: seamlessly integrate AI across both front-end and back-end systems, taking ownership of the entire product.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the integration of AI capabilities into existing software architecture (front-end and back-end) and taking responsibility for the complete product lifecycle, which aligns with traditional software engineering tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: Architect and code sophisticated web applications that integrate both front-end and back-end components, with a focus on enhancing user experience through AI.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the core software engineering responsibilities of designing, coding, and integrating full-stack web applications, with AI as a feature enhancement.

job_tasks.phrase: Work with cutting-edge AI technologies, specifically large language models (LLMs) like GPT-4 or Claude, to create autonomous tools and interactive features that redefine how students learn.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions working with specific LLMs (GPT-4, Claude) and the task of creating AI-driven tools and features, which falls under model development and specialization in GenAI.

job_tasks.phrase: Drive Technical Projects: Take ownership of the entire development process, from gathering requirements to launching and iterating on products.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the end-to-end software development lifecycle management, including requirements gathering, development, launch, and iteration, which is a key software engineering task.

job_tasks.phrase: Your work will directly impact thousands of students, ensuring that our tools meet their needs and set new standards for educational technology.
job_tasks.justification: This indicates an understanding of the business context, user needs, and strategic goals of the product within the educational technology sector.

job_tasks.phrase: You will be expected to integrate both, creating comprehensive and scalable solutions.
job_tasks.justification: This reinforces the need for full-stack integration and building robust, scalable software, a core software engineering responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: You will be driving innovation and building new, cutting-edge applications.
job_tasks.justification: This points to the development of new applications, a fundamental software engineering task, with an emphasis on innovation.

job_tasks.phrase: You will take high-level ideas and translate them into fully developed products, leveraging your expertise in AI and full-stack development.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the process of product development from conceptualization to a fully realized product, requiring a blend of AI and full-stack development skills.

soft_skills.phrase: taking ownership of the entire product
communicate complex ideas simply and effectively
continually learning and applying the latest advancements in AI and web development
Drive Technical Projects: Take ownership of the entire development process
take high-level ideas and translate them into fully developed products

profile.rationale: The job advertisement emphasizes a strong blend of core software engineering tasks (integrating AI into front-end and back-end systems, architecting and coding web applications, end-to-end product ownership) and specific Generative AI specialization (working with LLMs like GPT-4 and Claude to create features). The role requires a balanced mix of Macro-Category A and B tasks, with a clear focus on Generative AI technologies, fitting the definition of a Core GenAI Engineer.

confidence.reasoning: The job advertisement is exceptionally clear and detailed, explicitly outlining the required blend of software engineering and AI/LLM expertise. It also clearly states what the role is NOT, further clarifying the expectations. This level of detail allows for a high-confidence analysis.
